Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; trace of lotus flower and rosette in added white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed, but worn; exterior: dot band between dilute lines; below, painted decoration consisting of undetermined dot pattern.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2008) (phase 2)
